key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including SEC fines and ongoing litigation
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on discretionary client spending
Client concentration risk with a limited number of large clients
Intense competitive pressures from larger and niche consulting firms
controversies: $1 million civil fine to settle SEC charges related to a 2009 accounting scandal
Ongoing litigation such as the Gruner v. Huron Consulting Group case
social_issues: Ethical and reputational concerns stemming from past accounting scandals
governance_issues: Questions about corporate culture and governance due to ties to former Arthur Andersen partners
